## Accessing registry tables
* * *

To make 

```{r}
library(chronosphere)
```

Available database - variable combinations can be inspected with the `datasets()` funciton:

```{r}
dats <- datasets()
str(dats)
```


## Database-specific variables

The `datasets()` function in its default argumentation does not give information on what exact items are available. As these can be quite numerous. 

To see what kind of data are available in the `paleomap` entries

```{r}
pm <- datasets('paleomap')
str(pm)
```
